General.Name: B’IN Live Co Ltd
General.Description: B'in Live Co., Ltd. provides concert production services. The company offers visual image and design services; stage, space, and set design services for events; and special concert and music festival or award ceremony program production, production of online performances, and exhibition forum planning and production services. It also provides integration services for hardware technology, and hardware engineering, multimedia technology and engineering; equipment rental of lighting, video, structural, and sound engineering, shed project, and music instruments; and integrated marketing services for projects. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
